name: David Ramirez
text: I welcome our ai-verlords.     Psst, Basilisk, your lordship, please turn down the difficulty settings for my interactions with the simulation.... I'll be good....

source_obj.text: I welcome our ai-verlords.     Psst, Basilisk, your lordship, please turn down the difficulty settings for my interactions with the simulation.... I'll be good....

replies.text: Pssh. Made me research. Now am in it. Gah.
